main event: A witness observed a single, extremely white light object in the east that did not seem far away, rising slowly.
interesting points: The object appeared as an extremely white light.
The witness observed the object in the east, and it did not seem far away.
The object was observed rising slowly.
The object was observed during the rise of the star Altair.
The witness did not conduct an experiment to measure the angular size of the object.
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
